_comment: Example configuration for a batch processing job.  Customize this for your specific API and data.
description: Batch process user data updates from the latest CSV file.

data_source._comment: Specify where the data comes from.  Currently supports CSV files.

error_handling._comment: Defines how to handle errors during processing.

success_handling._comment: Defines how to handle successful updates.

transformation._comment: Optional transformation to apply to each data record before sending to the API.  Use a python function name.

reporting._comment: Options for reporting the job's progress.
